name: TECHNOLOGY CEO COUNCIL
govEntities: Office of the Vice President of the United States
sampleDescriptions:
Maintaining support for cross-border data flows and global market access.
NAFTA and KORUS modernization; U.S.-China trade policies.

Comprehensive tax reform with lower rate, territorial systems for international profits and effective innovation incentives.
Implementation of PL 115-97 (H.R 1/tax reform).

Robust cyber security policies; high-skilled immigration; improved innovation infrastructure, including more spectrum.
H.R. 2227 - Modernizing Government Technology Act of 2017 (MGT Act) implementatio
Maintaining support for robust federal R&D.

Increasing efficiency of government through IT modernization, acquisition reform and smarter use of technology.
H.R. 2227 - Modernizing Government Technology Act of 2017 (MGT Act) implementation.
